identity.name: Gurukrupa Mess
identity.ethos: Authentic, Wholesome, Trustworthy. 'Ghar ka swad' (Taste of Home).

typography.instructions: Use 'Manrope' for all English text. Use 'Mukta' for all Marathi text. Ensure adequate line height for Marathi readability.

layout_strategies.bento_grid: Use Flexbox with 'flexWrap: wrap' and percentage widths (e.g., '48%' for two columns with 'gap: 4%'). Mix full-width hero cards with half-width detail cards.
layout_strategies.list_view: For Order History and Admin lists, use FlatList with generous padding (paddingVertical: 16).
layout_strategies.safe_area: Always wrap main content in SafeAreaView or equivalent padding to avoid notch overlap.

navigation.user: Bottom Tab Bar (Home, Menu, Subscription, Profile). Floating Action Button for 'Cart' or 'Support'.
navigation.admin: Drawer Navigation (Dashboard, Orders, Menu, Customers, Subscriptions). Distinct header color (#FFF7ED) to differentiate from User view.

hero_thali.description: Authentic Indian Thali with stainless steel bowls

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle noise pattern or 'paper' texture image on the background if possible, or keep it 'Warm Off-White' (#FFFCF8) to simulate paper.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use 'lucide-react-native' or '@expo/vector-icons'. Style: Rounded, Stroke Width 2. Color: Primary (#C2410C) or Text Secondary (#57534E).
visual_enhancers.illustrations: Avoid generic 3D hands. Use simple line art or the provided authentic photos.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'blue' for primary actions. Use the defined 'Terracotta' (#C2410C).
Ensure 44px minimum touch targets for all buttons (Thumb-friendly).
Use 'elevation' for Android shadows and 'shadow*' props for iOS.
Always handle 'Loading' and 'Error' states gracefully with visual feedback.
For Marathi text, increase line height by 10-15% compared to English to accommodate matras.
Admin panels should be dense but touchable. Use 'Card' layouts for orders, not just tables.
instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'lucide-react-native' for icons if not present.
Use React Native 'StyleSheet' or inline styles using the tokens above.
Implement the 'English / Marathi' toggle using a Context or simple state.
For the 'Menu', use a Masonry or Grid layout using Flexbox wrap.
